thread.section_title: Futonland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Futonland | futonland.com
thread.title: Lisa Dellaterza

author: Lisa Dellaterza
title: Lisa Dellaterza
text: I must say I dealt with Kelvin and what a pleasure he was. He dealt with my insanity and all my questions and call backs, especially that I was buying without seeing it in person, which goes against everything I believe since I work for Consumer affairs for the state of NJ and tell the consumers don't ever!! lol However like I said he went above and beyond the norm, he measured, he explained, he assured me all would be fine. Well I went ahead and bought the Klick Klat in which I am extremely satisfied with and would highly recommend first dealing with Kelvin and second the quality of the merchandise at Futonland. Thank you so much Kelvin your worth your weight in Gold!!!
